title: Greek pastitsio pasta bake
ingredients: ['For the meat pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '800g minced lamb', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '2 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 large onion, diced', '350g pasta of your choice (e.g. penne or similar size)', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', 'For the bechamel sauce', '50g butter', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '500ml whole milk', '1 dash ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '150g grated cheese of your choice (e.g. Parmesan), divided', '200g Greek yoghurt']
